metadata.title: CVE-2021-26947 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) issue Odoo Community 15.0 and earlier and Odoo Enterprise 15.0 and earlier, allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script in the browser of a victim, via a crafted link.

criterions.comment: odoo package in kinetic is affected and may need fixing.
